title: The National Lottery: Official
description:
The Official National Lottery app is where you can play: 

Lotto
The one. The only. The original National Lottery game.
It’s the nation’s game, with thousands winning prizes in every draw.
Lotto tickets cost £2 per play, with draws every Wednesday and Saturday.

EuroMillions
There’s big and then there’s EuroMillions big!
This is the game with out of this world jackpots, creating new millionaires every week.
EuroMillions tickets cost £2.50 per play, with draws every Tuesday and Friday.

Set For Life
Dig out your bucket list! You could win £10,000 every month for 30 years* with Set For Life.
Pay just £1.50 per line and play up to 4 weeks in advance.
Draw days every Monday and Thursday.

Thunderball 
£1 might make your night. Win £500,000* for just £1!
Draws every Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday.

Or play an Instant Win Game
In just a few taps, you could win anything from a few pounds to a life-changing million.
With prizes that never run out, there’s an Instant Win Game for everyone!
Games cost from £1 to £5 to play.

Lotto HotPicks & EuroMillions HotPicks
Bigger prizes for fewer numbers
Pick and match winning balls from the main draws or choose a Lucky Dip® for randomly selected numbers. 

And don't forget, every time you play a National Lottery game you help support good causes all over the UK. In fact, £30M is raised on average each week**.

Besides playing, managing how you do so has never been easier:

Enable Touch ID and Face Recognition and sign-in to your account instantly.
Save your lucky numbers and enter draws at the tap of a button.
In a rush? Scan your paper tickets in seconds to see if you’re a winner.
Link your bank account details to add and withdraw funds at any time.
Set limits to manage fund levels and how many games you can play per day.

Download now and play The National Lottery from the palm of your hand.

To improve the app experience, we collect anonymous information about browsing behaviour. More information is available in our Privacy Policy at https://www.national-lottery.co.uk/privacy-policy
 
If you have a suggestion, a bug to report or a new feature for us to consider, we want to know! Email app@camelotgroup.co.uk.
 
Please note whilst available for download for tablet, the app is best used on mobile devices.
 
Players must be 18 or over to download this app. App Ts&Cs apply.
 
*Prizes are fixed, subject to capping.
**Around £30 million raised weekly is an average based on April 2018 - October 2019.
 
 
If you're worried about yourself, or someone you know, speak in confidence to the people at GamCare on 0808 8020 133 or visit www.gamcare.org.uk. You can find out more about our approach to responsible play on the Responsible Play page, found in the app menu.
releaseNotes:
- Play the games you love with The National Lottery app! 
- To improve your National Lottery experience, we’ve given our Transaction History in My Account a refresh
- There are now exclusive games that are only available on our app. Come and give them a try!
- We have integrated with GAMSTOP. If you've registered for the national gambling self-exclusion scheme, you will no longer be able to play Instant Win Games on the app

title: National Lottery Results
description:
Get the latest UK Lottery results within seconds of the draws taking place. This easy-to-use app shows the National Lottery numbers, prize breakdown information and jackpots for the following lotteries:

Lotto
EuroMillions (including UK and European Millionaire Maker)
Thunderball
Set For Life
Lotto HotPicks
EuroMillions HotPicks


The following features are also included:


QR Ticket Scanner
--------------------------------------
For lottery tickets purchased in shops, simply scan the QR code printed on your ticket using your phone’s camera to see if you have won a prize.


Ticket Checker
--------------------------------------
Enter and save your chosen numbers to see if you have won or to see how often they have come up in the past. You can also label your tickets – great if you play multiple lines or if you run a syndicate. The ticket checker also highlights prizes won on each ticket as well as calculating the total for each lottery. Only play lotteries on certain days of the week? Not a problem, you can exclude your checked tickets from draws you do not play.


Customisable Notifications
--------------------------------------
Get notified instantly when the latest lottery results and prize breakdowns become available. The App allows you to customise notifications for specific lottery games and you can also choose which days of the week you play. Want to know when the jackpot has rolled over or has reached a certain amount? Just head to the Notification section of the app to set up your alerts. There is also the option to set notifications at times that suit you - great for reminding you to purchase tickets before the draw.


Random Number Generator
--------------------------------------
Stuck for numbers? Use this handy tool and let the app choose your numbers rather than having to rely on Lucky Dip numbers!


Results Archive
--------------------------------------
Access to the full archive of results dating back to the first draw of each lottery.


Settings
--------------------------------------
Customise which lotteries display in the app and in which order.


Support
--------------------------------------
If you have any feedback or suggestions on how we can improve this app, please get in touch at support@lottery.co.uk.
releaseNotes: This version includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

title: The Health Lottery
description:
Download the official Health Lottery Mobile app to play a variety of Health Lottery games on the go – AND support vital health-related charities across Great Britain!

· £100,000 FREE prize draw every Wednesday & Saturday.
· £77,777 to be won instantly on scratch cards. · £25,000 jackpot draws every 3 minutes. · 
 - Over £150 Million won in prizes so far.
 · 20% of every play goes to health-related causes.
 · Over £112M given to charity, changing over 500,000 lives.
 · Register in seconds.
 · Play scratch cards from as little as 5p

Our new app remembers your details, so you only need to log-in once and your wins will be automatically shown. You can also check the winning numbers in all of our five weekly charity lottery jackpot draws for tickets bought in retail.

Easily set up a subscription to play lottery by Direct Debit so you never miss a draw and take advantage of all our latest promotions – whether that be free tickets, raffles, or cashback bonuses.

Tickets for our draws cost only £1 and our draws take place every Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday). Each ticket you buy for any Wednesday or Saturday draw gives players an automatic entry into a free prize draw for £100,000. 

Since we launched in 2011, we’ve given away over £150 million in prizes to our players.

QuickWin
Our revolutionary QuickWin game runs a lottery draw every 3 minutes! You’re playing for a £25,000 jackpot in each draw.

Scratch Cards
We run a wondrous array of online Scratch Cards, each with their own odds and INSTANT jackpots up to £77,777! You can play for as little as 5p.

The Health Lottery is not a national lottery. We operate on behalf of 12 Community Interest Companies (CICs), managing 12 society lotteries in rotation. Each is licensed by the Gambling Commission and represents multiple local authority areas across Great Britain – raising money for health-related good causes within their respective areas. Each month a different regional society takes a turn at participating in the draws so that every area in England, Scotland and Wales gets an appropriate share of the monies raised. Since inception in 2011, over £113 million has been raised for good causes through The Health Lottery – which has supported over 3,000 projects.

For details of when each society lottery is running, see the location of each society, or to find out more about The Health Lottery, please click on the link below. https://www.healthlottery.co.uk/about-us/

To improve the App, we collect anonymous information about browsing behaviour. For more information on our Privacy Policy, please visit our website at https://www.healthlottery.co.uk/privacy-policy/

Games Rules and Procedures apply. Players must be 16 or over and be physically located within Great Britain (England, Scotland, and Wales).

- General performance improvements and bug fixes
 - Payment gateway enhancements

YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/user/HealthLottery
Twitter - https://twitter.com/HealthLottery
Instagram - https://www.instagram/healthlottery

title: Lottery Balls -  Lotto Results
description:
Increase your chances of winning the lottery with Lottery Balls. 

Ever noticed how there's rollover after rollover without a winner and then multiple people hit the jackpot at the same time. There's a reason for that; people are all picking their numbers the same way. 

You can beat this trend. Lottery Balls uses highly advanced randomising algorithms to find the numbers that other people aren't choosing. 

As well as helping you win the top prize and not having to share it, Lottery Balls increases your chances of winning the smaller prizes. When using other random number generators, including the "lucky dip" available at retailers, each row of numbers will be produced in isolation. Using their method, if you're buying more than one ticket, you'll find you're repeating the same number on several lines. That's fine if all you're interested in is the jackpot, but for smaller prizes, you've got a better chance of winning if you cover a wider range of numbers. That's why Lottery Balls generates multiple lines holistically, without repeating any numbers across the different tickets. 

Ever forgotten to buy your ticket? Lottery Balls can remind you on the day of the draw to go out and get it before it's too late. 

Check results in the app and receive a notification to let you know when the draw has happened. Look up the results from previous draws. 

Like playing the same numbers every week? Lottery Balls can save your favorite numbers for quick and easy access every time. 

Lottery Balls works with any lottery. We've even added built-in generation rules for many popular worldwide lotteries.

description:

With Lottery Places, you can instantly find the nearest official lottery retailers, no matter where you are.

For the first time, we have created a centralized way of finding lottery retailers that crosses state and country boundaries.  No longer do you need to download apps or visit websites of individual lotteries, just to see where you can buy a lottery ticket.

You can search for lottery retailers closest to your current GPS position, or from any other location you specify.  Then, get driving directions to any retailer with a single tap of a button.

Our comprehensive database of lottery retailers is updated regularly, to make sure you can find the newest lottery retailers — and not be led to stores that are no longer selling lottery tickets.

title: California Lottery
description:
Get the latest California lottery results within minutes of the draws taking place. This easy-to-use app includes the following lotteries:

- Powerball
- Mega Millions
- SuperLotto Plus
- Fantasy 5
- Daily 4
- Daily 3
- Daily Derby

Powerball, Mega Millions and SuperLotto Plus also include a full breakdown displaying the number of winners and amount paid out for each prize level.                                                  


The following features are also included:


Ticket Checker
----------------------------
Enter and save your chosen numbers to see if you have won or to see how often they have come up in the past. You can also label your tickets – great if you play multiple lines or if you run a syndicate. The ticket checker also highlights prizes won on each ticket as well as calculating the total for each lottery. Only play lotteries on certain days of the week? Not a problem, you can exclude your checked tickets from draws you do not play.


Customizable Notifications
----------------------------
Get notified instantly when the latest lottery results and prize breakdowns become available. The App allows you to customise notifications for specific lottery games and you can also choose which days of the week you play. Want to know when the jackpot has rolled over or has reached a certain amount? Just head to the Notification section of the app to set up your alerts. There is also the option to set notifications at times that suit you - great for reminding you to purchase tickets before the draw.


Random Number Generator
-----------------------------
Stuck for numbers? Use this handy tool and let the app choose your numbers rather than having to rely on house numbers and anniversary dates!


Results Archive
----------------------------
Access to the full archive of results dating back to the first draw of each lottery.


Settings
----------------------------
Customise which lotteries display in the app and in which order.


Support
----------------------------
If you have any feedback or suggestions on how we can improve this app, please get in touch at contact@lottery.net.

title: First words kids learn to read
description:
*** Fun educational game for toddlers of age 1.5 and up 
*** English voice over – Learn first words
*** Developed with certified child psychologists 
*** 10 beautiful mini-game boards 

About the game: 
----------------- 
"TinyHands Lotto" is an educational game for children of age 1.5 and up. 
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles. 

The game is designed to enhance the following: 
- Hand-eye coordination 
- Concentration 
- Categorization 
- Visual perception 
- Vocabulary 

Game Boards: 
-------------------- 
The game consists of 10 beautiful boards organized in a book like structure with big colourful buttons. This unique structure allows the toddler to easily navigate between the different boards and play independently. The boards were CAREFULLY CHOSEN in order to represent basic concepts from the child's world. 

TinyHands Games:
 
TinyHands Sorting Series
A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon TreeHouse
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Connect The Dots
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed. Designed for children aged 3+.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

About the Team: 
We believe that children learn best through playing. We teamed up with certified child psychologists and experienced educators out of desire to create fun games that will help our children acquire new concepts and improve their skills. In addition, we design our games to provide quality playtime for parents and children together.
releaseNotes:

It means that this app works on all iPhone and iPad models. We welcome any feedback if you have problems with this app to our support group at info@getgreatmerchandise.com

It's a tool, it could be time consuming fun and enjoyment and it also provides the results of all of the New York Lottery games (NUMBERS, WIN4, TAKE5, LOTTO, MegaMillions, PowerBall, SweetMillions and the PICK10) and the current Jackpot Amounts for the MegaMillions, PowerBall and Lotto games.  We recently added a Hot Numbers section for the NUMBERS and WIN4 games. Just go the the screen and see what numbers have come out the most times in the past seven days. Scroll down the screen and see the top ten most popular numbers drawn since 1-19-2003.

Use this App as a tool to analyze your numbers. See if they never came out or when they came out. See if your lucky numbers are hot or cold. The App provides the numbers and you decide if it is due to come out or not.

Use this App for fun and enjoyment. Play by yourself or with friends. Pick the numbers and see if they came out recently or a while ago or if they never came out.
